mapper.select: select max(flore) from blog_db.blog_comment where article_id=#{id}

select c.id,c.username,c.flore,c.ip,c.create_time,c.article_id as article_id, c.content as content,c.email,c.region,parent.content as fatherComment,ba.title, c.has_read,c.comment_status from blog_comment as c left join blog_comment parent on c.father_comment_id=parent.id left join blog_article ba on c.article_id = ba.id order by c.create_time desc limit #{key_offset},#{pageSize}

article_id=#{item.articleId} and flore=#{item.flore}
